titles.title: To provide for the retention of the name of the geologic formation known as "Devils Tower" at the Devils Tower National Monument in the State of Wyoming.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on National Parks.

committee.subcommittee: National Parks, Recreation, and Public Lands
committee.name: House Resources

bill.summary: 3/8/2005--Introduced. Provides for the mountain known as "Devils Tower" at the Devils Tower National Monument in Wyoming to continue to be named and referred to as "Devils Tower."
